resources.string: ODYSSEY is the annual cultural fest of HBTU,Kanpur .It has now evolved into one of the biggest cultural extravaganza of Northern India. Being the most eagerly awaited event of the year, it bears witness to an eruption of the cultural flair and creative exuberance which is the hallmark of our institute. ODYSSEY â€™17 will be organized from MARCH , 2017. ODYSSEY in previous years witnessed over 3000 footfalls and saw participation from over 50 top colleges from all corners of the country.
